entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.7°C

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending early this morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning overnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023
